abstract: Public Company Accounting Oversight Board releases report criticizing accounting firm Deloitte & Touche, saying that the company lacks an adequate system of quality control in its audits.
snippet: In an unprecedented rebuke to a major accounting firm, the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board said Deloitte & Touche lacked adequate quality control.
lead_paragraph: In an unprecedented rebuke to a major accounting firm, the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board said Deloitte & Touche lacked adequate quality control.

headline.main: Accounting Board Criticizes Deloitte’s Auditing System
headline.print_headline: Board Finds Bad Audits At Deloitte
headline.seo: Accounting Board Criticizes Deloitte’s Auditing System
